room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Dayton in Dayton
review: This was our first visit to Breakout Dayton. We did the “Hostage” room and had a blast. We had a great time and go out with 18 seconds left! Allie was our game master and she was great. If you haven’t gone...go. If you have... go again!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Dayton in Dayton
review: Great experience brings out good teamwork and relief when it's over because you're out. LOL thank you and keep up the great work

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Dayton in Dayton
review: It was amazing to say the least. We were only 2 people and we did the Hostage, we got out in 56 minutes and 9 seconds and our game master was Gauh (I think, the pen stopped working as he was writing his name). He was amazing! He gave us the clues we needed in order to help us figure it out and they weren't too vague nor too specific! Magnificent!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Dayton in Dayton
review: Played the Hostage with Sarah as my game master a month before I left for graduate school out of state. My group of coworkers and I had soo much fun and we beat it with about 3 minutes remaining. It was a great team bonding experience and Sarah was so funny. I highly recommend Daytonians to visit Breakout and enjoy a fun and challenging game!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Dayton in Dayton
review: This was so much fun! We had three adults and three teenagers. We did the Hostage room. It was our first experience of this kind. We did not make it out in time, but Ryan was super nice and helpful.
